programme.title: Nixon, 'and the rest you know'...
programme.short_synopsis: Looking back to the Letter from America written after President Nixon's resignation.
programme.medium_synopsis: How the wistful sign off "and the rest you know" at the end of Alistair Cooke's letter on how congressional moves to impeach Richard Nixon came about.
programme.long_synopsis: How the wistful sign off "and the rest you know" at the end of Alistair Cooke's letter on how congressional moves to impeach Richard Nixon came about.
